title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: This task aims to comprehensively gather, analyze, and document detailed technical requirements for the Advanced Materials Recycling System. The requirements will include specifying the types of materials to be processed (including their properties and characteristics), desired output formats, any specific constraints or regulations to consider (such as safety, environmental, and industry standards), the expected scale and performance requirements (with realistic benchmarks), a clear definition of project boundaries, potential future integrations with existing systems, scalability plans, explorations of opportunities for system optimization, and data structures and databases needed to support the system, including security measures required to protect sensitive information. Additionally, it will analyze the impact on operations, maintenance requirements, and potential risks, outline a plan for testing and validation, and provide recommendations for future research and development. Upon completion, this task will serve as the foundation for the design and development phases. To ensure a thorough review, please provide any suggestions or improvements to refine the scope and the approach for this task.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the recycling system, including the main components, data flow, and integration points with existing systems.

title: Develop Material Identification Module
description: Implement a module to accurately identify and classify the incoming advanced materials based on their composition and properties.

title: Develop Material Processing Module
description: Implement a module to handle the physical processing of the identified materials, including sorting, disassembly, and preparation for recycling.

title: Develop Output Handling Module
description: Implement a module to manage the output of the recycling process, including packaging, labeling, and integration with downstream systems or transportation logistics.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for monitoring and controlling the recycling system, including dashboards, reporting, and configuration options.

title: Set up Database and Data Management
description: Design and implement a database schema to store and manage data related to the recycling process, including material information, process logs, and output tracking.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop and implement security measures to protect the system from unauthorized access, data breaches, and potential cyber threats.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the recycling system, ensuring seamless integration and efficient software delivery.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy and develop test cases to ensure the proper functioning of the recycling system, including unit tests, integration tests, and system tests.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Prepare detailed technical documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API specifications, and user manuals, to support the development, deployment, and maintenance of the recycling system.
